name: ts-run
description: Run TypeScript in the browser - like ts-node but works everywhere

scripts.build-test: npm run clean &&  npm run build && npx parcel build src/test/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --public-url './' && npm run copy-test
scripts.build-test-local: npm run build-test &&  npx http-server docs
scripts.build-test-local-gz: npm run build-test && gzip docs/*.* && npx http-server docs --gzip
scripts.copy-test: mkdir -p docs/libs && mkdir -p docs/test && cp node_modules/typescript/lib/lib.*.d.ts docs/libs && cp tsconfig.json docs/test
scripts.start-test: npm run copy-test && npx parcel serve  --no-hmr --open  --no-autoinstall src/test/index.html -d docs
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test

author: Sebastian Gurin
